{{disambig-more|The Fellowship of the Ring|[[The Fellowship of the Ring (disambiguation)]]}}
{{album
| image = The Lord of the Rings - The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings.jpg

| type=Soundtrack

'''''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings''''' is an album, by [[Howard Shore]], comprising of the soundtrack from the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|extended edition]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.

==Contents==
===Disc 1=== 
# [[Prologue: One Ring to Rule Them All]]
# [[The Shire (soundtrack)|The Shire]]
# [[Bag End (soundtrack)|Bag End]] 
# [[Very Old Friends (soundtrack)|Very Old Friends]]
# [[Flaming Red Hair]]
# [[Farewell Dear Bilbo (soundtrack)|Farewell Dear Bilbo]]
# [[Keep It Secret, Keep It Safe]] 
# [[A Conspiracy Unmasked (soundtrack)|A Conspiracy Unmasked]]
# [[Three Is Company (soundtrack)|Three Is Company]]
# [[The Passing of the Elves]]
# [[Saruman the White]]
# [[A Shortcut to Mushrooms (soundtrack)|A Shortcut to Mushrooms]]
# [[Strider (soundtrack)|Strider]]
# [[The Nazgûl]]

===Disc 2===
# [[Weathertop (soundtrack)|Weathertop]]
# [[The Caverns of Isengard]]
# [[Give Up the Halfling]]
# [[Orthanc (soundtrack)|Orthanc]]
# [[Rivendell (soundtrack)|Rivendell]]
# [[The Sword That Was Broken]]
# [[The Council of Elrond Assembles]] (feat. "Aníron (Theme for Aragorn and Arwen)," composed & performed by [[Enya]])
# [[The Great Eye]]
# [[Gilraen's Memorial (soundtrack)|Gilraen's Memorial]]
# [[The Pass of Caradhras (soundtrack)|The Pass of Caradhras]]
# [[The Doors Of Durin]]
# [[Moria (soundtrack)|Moria]]
# [[Gollum (soundtrack)|Gollum]]
# [[Balin's Tomb (soundtrack)|Balin's Tomb]]

===Disc 3===
# [[Khazad-Dûm (soundtrack)|Khazad-Dûm]]
# [[Caras Galadhon (soundtrack)|Caras Galadhon]] (feat. "Lament for Gandalf," performed by Elizabeth Fraser)
# [[The Mirror of Galadriel (soundtrack)|The Mirror of Galadriel]]
# [[The Fighting Uruk-Hai]]
# [[Parth Galen (soundtrack)|Parth Galen]]
# [[The Departure Of Boromir]]
# [[The Road Goes Ever on ... Pt. 1]]
# [[May It Be#tabber-Complete Recordings|May It Be]] (composed & performed by Enya)
# [[The Road Goes Ever On ... Pt. 2]] (feat. "In Dreams," performed by Edward Ross)

===Disc 4===
# Entire Score [DVD]
